ability.name: Lightning Rain
ability.description: Fire a barrage of 20/20/100 lightning strikes at random enemies. Each strike deals 160/235/666 (AP) magic damage and removes 10 current Mana from the current target.

ability.name: Black Hole
ability.description: Summon a black hole under a random enemy. After 2 seconds, it deals 370/600/99999 (AP) magic damage to the target and enemies within 2 hexes, and increases their damage taken by 20% for 10 seconds. Black holes generated after 18 seconds of combat are larger and deal 20% more damage.

ability.name: Tempered Fate
ability.description: Stun the largest group of enemies for 1.25/2/15 seconds. While Stunned, enemies lose 1500%/2000%/999900% (AP) Durability.

ability.name: Dragon's Descent
ability.description: Transform into a dragon for the rest of combat and replace this ability with Flame Breath. Become briefly untargetable and dive-bomb into the largest group of enemies, dealing 80/150/1500 (AP) magic damage in a 3-hex circle and Stunning for 1.25/1.25/10 seconds. After landing, cast Flame Breath immediately. Flame Breath: Breathe fire in a cone, dealing up to 700/1200/20000 (AP) magic damage to enemies hit. While breathing fire, is always enraged.

ability.name: Starfall
ability.description: Call down a shower of 14 stars over the next 2 seconds. Allies are healed for 105/165/1000 (AP) each time a star hits them.

stats.Passive: While any ally is below 50% Health, gain an additional 15 mana per attack.

ability.name: Earthquake
ability.description: Stomp three times, creating a surrounding earthquake that deals 460/640/5360 (ArmorMRAD) physical damage. When it ends, gain 130/165/4000 (AP) Armor and Magic Resist for 8 seconds. While casting, become Unstoppable.

ability.name: Sweeping Blade
ability.description: Gain 180/240/2500 (AP) Shield for 2/2/20 seconds and dash through the target, slashing nearby enemies for 135/245/6000 (AD) physical damage. Every third cast the slash deals 250% damage, hits a larger area, and Stuns enemies for 1.5 seconds. If only one enemy remains, repeatedly slash them until they die.

ability.name: Spell Thief
ability.description: Nab an Ability from another dimension and cast it.

ability.name: Windblast
ability.description: Deal 260/390/1350 (AP) magic damage toward the most enemies in a line.

stats.Passive: Launch three barrages that each deal 30/45/155 (AP) bonus magic damage and reduce the target's Magic Resist by 5.

ability.name: Quickdraw
ability.description: Dash towards the target, fire two attacks, and gain 30/40/80 (AP) Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

stats.Passive: Attacks fire 4 bullets in a cone that deal 35/60/200 (AD) physical damage each.

ability.name: Onslaught of Shadows
ability.description: Summon spectral riders that charge through the target, dealing 200/300/1500 (AP) magic damage and Stunning enemies hit for 1.5/2/8 seconds.

ability.name: Golden Scales
ability.description: For 2 seconds, reduce incoming damage by 30/50/300. Then heal 450/600/3000 (AP) Health and grant other nearby allies 150/250/1200 (AP) Shield for 5 seconds. The Shield grants 30% Attack Speed while it holds.

ability.name: Mercurial Justice
ability.description: Transform into melee form, dealing 300/400/1500 (AP) magic damage to the current target and nearby enemies. Replace this Ability with Mercurial Judgement and gain 40 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat. Mercurial Judgement: Deal 400/550/2000 (AP) magic damage and 225/275/1200 (AP) bonus magic damage to nearby enemies. Then, heal for 100/150/500 (AP) health and an additional 20% per enemy struck.

ability.name: Slipstream
ability.description: Dash through the target, dealing 270/435/1490 (ADAP) physical damage. If this damages a Shield, gain a Shield equal to 80/100/300% of the damage dealt to it for 4 seconds. Instantly recast if the target is killed or remains Shielded.

ability.name: Aegis Assault
ability.description: Brace a shield for 2 seconds, doubling passive Durability and dealing 230/360/1215 (ADAP) physical damage in a cone towards enemies over the duration. Wound enemies hit for 3 seconds.

ability.name: Jade Form
ability.description: Enter Jade stance, gaining 20%/25%/40% Durability, immunity to crowd control, and empowering the next 3 attacks with special effects. Attack 1: Deal 190/250/1700 (AD) physical damage and Stun the target for 1 second(s). Attack 2: Deal 190/250/1700 true damage. Attack 3: End the stance, dealing 190/250/1700 (AD) physical damage to all enemies in a line and Stunning them for 1 second(s).

ability.name: Tideblossom
ability.description: Mark an unmarked enemy, dealing 200/300/900 (AP) magic damage to enemies along the way. Marks transfer to a nearby enemy on Mark owner death. After 3 casts, the next cast deals 335/505/1510 (AP) magic damage in a 2-hex radius around all marked enemies.

ability.name: Rampage
ability.description: Charge toward the farthest enemy within 2.5 hexes, dealing 145/220/650 (AD) physical damage and Stunning enemies hit. Then bite an enemy, dealing 350/525/1575 (AD) physical damage and ignoring 33% (AP) of the target's Armor.

ability.name: Dragon Master's Decree
ability.description: Launch 8 dragonlings toward nearby enemies. Each deals 90/130/600 (AP) magic damage to their target, then returns to restore for 12% missing Health.

ability.name: Feathers FLY!
ability.description: For 4 seconds, attacks leave a feather behind the target and 2/2/4 nearby enemies. At the end of this duration, recall all feathers, dealing 23/33/100 (ADAP) physical damage per feather to enemies struck.

ability.name: Pale Cascade
ability.description: Gain a 300/350/400 (AP) Shield over 6 seconds and summon 5/6/7 orbs to orbit. These orbs explode for 85/105/115 (AP) magic damage when they hit an enemy, refreshing the Shield when the final orb explodes.

ability.name: Egg Toss
ability.description: Heimerdinger lobs an egg at the highest percent Health enemy, dealing 225/325/475 magic damage and stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

ability.name: Dragon's Rage
ability.description: Kick the target, Stunning them for 1.25 seconds and knocking them back. The target and all enemies hit take 215/325/425 (AP) magic damage. 20% Shred damaged enemies for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Whimsy
ability.description: Enchant the 3 closest allies or enemies. Enchanted allies gain @ModifiedAttackSpeedPercent@ (AP) bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds. Enchanted enemies are Stunned and transformed into a docile feline for 1 seconds, taking 20% increased damage.

ability.name: Fireballs!
ability.description: Lob a fireball towards a random enemy that explodes on impact, dealing 190/285/455 (AP) magic damage to enemies within 1 hex, and bouncing additional fireballs that deal 30/35/40% of the damage.

ability.name: Fireballs!
ability.description: Lob a fireball towards a random enemy that explodes on impact, dealing 190/285/455 (AP) magic damage to enemies within 1 hex, and bouncing additional fireballs that deal 30/35/40% of the damage.

ability.name: Fireballs!
ability.description: Lob a fireball towards a random enemy that explodes on impact, dealing 190/285/455 (AP) magic damage to enemies within 1 hex, and bouncing additional fireballs that deal 30/35/40% of the damage.

ability.name: Consume
ability.description: Bite the target, dealing 425/640/1020 (AP) magic damage. If the target has less Health than Nunu & Willump prior to the bite, deal an additional 50% damage.

ability.name: Recklessness
ability.description: Deal 90/135/215 (AD) physical damage and gain 35%/45%/55% (AP) Attack Speed for 5 seconds. If below 50% Health, the Attack Speed is doubled.

stats.Passive: Permanently gain 4% AD Attack Damage after each death. (Current Bonus: X AD Attack Damage.)

ability.name: Disarming Diversion
ability.description: Dash to the furthest enemy within 2 hexes, Stunning all units passed through for 1.5 seconds, and Taunting the target. Then, gain a 230/350/650 (AP) Shield for 4 seconds. Attacks grant an additional 50/70/100 (AP) Shield.

ability.name: Unseen Predator
ability.description: Leap to the lowest Armor enemy, deal 230/340/535 (AD%AP) physical damage, then gain 200% Attack Speed for 2 attacks.

ability.name: Serenade of the Seas
ability.description: Grant 140/180/260 (AP) Shield and 20/30/50 (AP) bonus magic damage on-attack to allies within 2 hexes for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Petricite Burst
ability.description: Deal 140/200/320 (AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and gain 365/415/525 (AP) Shield for 6 seconds. If Shield is already active, hit a larger area and 30% Mana Reave enemies struck.

ability.name: Explosive Charge
ability.description: Tristana fires up to 1 explosive charges, prioritizing the closest targets without a charge. Charges detonate after 1 seconds, dealing @TotalDamage@ physical damage (@PercentAD*100@% Attack Damage AD) to nearby enemies and an additional @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to the target.

ability.name: Chain of Constellations
ability.description: Shoot a tendril towards the current target, dealing 170/255/475 (AD) physical damage to the first enemy hit and Stunning them for 1 seconds. It then spreads to 3 nearby enemies, dealing 155/255/405 (AP) magic damage and Stunning them for the same duration.

ability.name: Relentless Storm
ability.description: Gain 400/700/1100 max Health. For the rest of combat, every 3rd attack deals 75/115/210 (AP) bonus magic damage to the target, and 75/115/210 (AP) magic damage to up to 4 additional enemies.

ability.name: Watershock Laser
ability.description: Fire a water pulse at the closest enemy within 3 hexes, or at the centermost enemy, Stunning them for 0.75 seconds. When the pulse explodes it deals 70/110/175 (AD) physical damage and creates a laser behind the target that deals 275/375/525 (AP) magic damage to all enemies hit.

ability.name: Somersault Assault
ability.description: Gain 375/450/650 (AP) Shield for 2 seconds and deal 340/540/1050 (AD) physical damage to the highest percent health enemy, Stunning and knocking them back slightly.

ability.name: Binding Eclipse
ability.description: Fires 5/5/7 (AP) bolts in a cone, each dealing 195/315/505 (AD) physical damage. Enemies only take damage from one bolt. Then, Stun all enemies hit for 1 second(s).

ability.name: Unbreakable
ability.description: Raise shield against the largest group of enemies for 4 seconds, gaining 70%/75%/85% (AP) Durability against damage from that direction.

ability.name: Mega Gnar
ability.description: Jump to the current target and Stun nearby enemies for 1 second. Gain 95/105/115% Attack Damage and 40/60/90 Armor, but reduce Attack Range to 1 hex.

ability.name: Counter Strike
ability.description: Dodge all incoming attacks for 2 seconds. Then, deal 225/350/750 (AP) magic damage to all nearby enemies and Stun them for 1/1.25/1.5 second(s).

ability.name: Tidal Burst
ability.description: Fire 4 missiles split between the current target and up to 2 other targets within attack range, each dealing 45/65/100 (AP) magic damage. Increase by 2 missiles each cast, up to 12.

ability.name: Watch Out!
ability.description: Deal 215/275/370 (AP) magic damage spread amongst the target and all enemies within a 1-hex radius, plus 180/230/330 (AP) bonus magic damage to the target.

ability.name: Cosmic Flare
ability.description: Fire a star at the farthest enemy, dealing 325/410/525 (AP) magic damage to the first enemy hit and 175/210/240 (AP) magic damage to subsequent enemies.

ability.name: Elemental Blade
ability.description: Dash to the best position to strike enemies with a blade, dealing 185/280/415 (AP) magic damage in a short line through the target and Disarming them for 1.5/1.75/2 seconds.

ability.name: Iron Bond
ability.description: Tether to the lowest percent Health ally, dealing 160/240/440 (AP) magic damage to all enemies between. Gain 35/40/50% of current Armor and Magic Resist, and grant the same amount to the bound ally for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Blast Potion
ability.description: Deal 130/210/345 (ADAP) physical damage to enemies in a 1-hex radius centered on the target and 20% Sunder them for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Way of the Hunter
ability.description: Attacks alternate between dealing 85/125/180 (AP) bonus magic damage and dealing 15/30/50 (AD) bonus physical damage.

ability.name: Unstable Current
ability.description: Restore 250/285/340 (AP) Health and explode outwards towards enemies within 2 hexes, dealing 10%/12%/18% of their max Health as magic damage.

ability.name: Grasping Spines
ability.description: Summon vines in the row with the most enemies, dealing 225/325/550 (AP) magic damage and Stunning them for 1 second(s).

ability.name: Mystic Shot
ability.description: Fire an energy bolt towards the target, dealing 190/285/430 (AP) magic damage to the first enemy hit. Gain 10% (AP) Attack Speed, stacking up to 5 times.

ability.name: Jadesplosion
ability.description: Deals its Jade explosion damage around it.

ability.name: Inner Flame
ability.description: Fire a burst of energy towards the current target, dealing 200/265/380 (AP) magic damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the first enemy hit.

ability.name: Solar Barrier
ability.description: Create a surrounding barrier that reduces all incoming damage by 25/35/60 (AP) for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Coral Shield
ability.description: Gain 270/376/552 (HealthAP) Shield for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Fury of the Dawn
ability.description: Gain 225/350/650 max Health for 6 seconds, dealing 70/100/205 (AP) magic damage to adjacent enemies every second.

ability.name: Primal Surge
ability.description: Transform into Cougar Form for the rest of combat, reducing Attack Range to 1 and gaining bonus movement speed and 40%/45%/50% (AP) Attack Speed. While in Cougar Form, every 3rd attack swipes the target for 115/175/260 (AD) physical damage.

ability.name: Warrior's Wrath
ability.description: Deal 42/76/136 (HealthAP) magic damage to enemies in a cone. Then repeat the damage on the target and the enemy directly behind, Stunning them for 1.5/1.75/2 seconds.

ability.name: Last Embrace
ability.description: Launch mist toward the farthest enemy, dealing 100/180/340 (AD) physical damage in a 1-hex radius centered on the first enemy hit, plus 300/450/650 (AP) bonus magic damage to the target.

ability.name: Knuckle Down
ability.description: For 4 seconds, gain 50/60/80 (AP) Armor and Magic Resist. Every other punch deals 90/135/205 (AD) bonus physical damage.

ability.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
ability.description: Gain 300/375/450 (AP) Shield for 8 seconds and 160/180/200% Attack Speed while it holds.

ability.name: Flowing Volley
ability.description: Throw 3 stones towards the current target, each dealing 170/255/385 (AP) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

ability.name: Transfusion
ability.description: Heal 275/325/375 (AP) and deal 275/325/375 (AP) magic damage to the target.

ability.name: Crushing Blow
ability.description: Deal 170/270/465 (ADAP) physical damage to the target and Stun them for 1/1.25/1.5 second(s).
